#summary Options Menu

=Options Menu=

The following commands are available from the Options menu:

  * [ConfigurePotato Configure Program Settings]
  * [Events Global Events]
  * [SlashCommands Global Slash Commands]
  * [Macros Global Macro Window]
  * [KeyboardShortcuts Customize Keyboard Shortcuts]
  * [ConfigureWorlds Configure World]
  * [Events Configure Events]
  * [SlashCommands Slash Commands]
  * [Macros Macro Window]
  * [ChangeLanguage Change Language]
